set(SOURCE
        ${SOURCE}
        PARENT_SCOPE
        )
set(HEADERS
        ${HEADERS}
        ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/Converter.hpp
        ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/OutputManager.hpp
